title: What is Mesmerismus and How to Learn Its Techniques in Dr. Paret's School?
first_phrase: This text is a collection of the most interesting pieces about animal magnetism, including F.A. Mesmer's memoire on the discovery of animal magnetism. The first part of the text includes the origins and language of mesmerism, as well as the basic symbolic notebook and protocols of the technique. The second part describes the three levels of mesmerism, including additional exercises and protocols for personal success and the use of sound, color, and symbolism. The last part contains exercises for improving concentration, physical energy, and willpower, as well as a glossary of terms and historical sources. The text concludes with information on where to learn the original techniques of personal magnetism at Dr. Paret's school.
